name: Rain-X 820147 WeatherBeater, 26" and 16" Windshield Wiper Blades - All-Season OEM Quality, Conventional, Vehicle Specific Fit, Pack of 2
short_description: Over 15 Years Of Trusted Quality - Conventional wiper blades that have stood the test of time, meeting or exceeding all original equipment manufacturers' standards for quality and durability
Ease Of Installation - Comes equipped with a pre-installed multi-adapter for easy installation on most vehicles that require different wiper blade arm types
All Natural Rubber Squeegee - Resists cracking, splitting, and tearing caused by various hot and cold weather conditions, windshield wiper fluid, and road salt
Traditional Blade Structure - Built with a galvanized steel frame that provides long-lasting strength and durability and prevents rust and corrosion
Improved Driving Visibility And Safety - Multiple pressure points and embedded friction reducers enable even pressure distribution across the length of the blade helping to deliver a clean wipe
product_description: Rain-X, a recognized and respected name in wiper blades for almost 20 years, is committed to providing you with the confidence of improved driving visibility. For over 15 years, Rain-X WeatherBeater (the original WeatherBeater wiper blade) is still known and trusted for its quality, durability, and value. WeatherBeater has been designed to be a high-quality traditional wiper blade that meets or exceeds all original equipment manufacturers' standards for quality, durability, and construction. This conventional blade features a natural rubber squeegee, a classic galvanized steel frame, multiple pressure points, and embedded friction reducers. The natural rubber squeegee provides resistance to cracking and splitting caused by weather, windshield wiper fluid, and road salt. The galvanized steel frame provides long-lasting strength and durability while also preventing rust and corrosion. Multiple pressure points and embedded friction reducers enable even pressure distribution across the length of the blade and help provide a clean wipe. If you need additional help with determining the right wiper blade size for your car, reference our Blade Finder or Amazon's Confirmed Fit program. If you need help with installing your new wiper blades, installation videos can be found by scanning the QR code on the back of your wiper blade’s packaging.
product_details: Vehicle Service Type ‎Toyota RAV4 2013-2023, Toyota Corolla 2009-2018, Honda Accord 2018-2021, Hyundai Tucson 2018-2024, Honda CR-V 2007-2011
Model ‎Rain-X WeatherBeater Wiper Blade Combo Pack 26" and 16"

name: BOSCH 3397014156 AeroTwin OE Replacement Wiper Blades Driver & Passenger Side - Set of 2 (26" & 16")
short_description: [EXCEPTIONAL ALL-WEATHER PERFORMANCE] - A dual rubber compound with graphite coating ensures streak-free water removal, delivering exceptional visibility in rain, snow, and extreme weather conditions
[SIMPLE INSTALLATION] - Pre-assembled OE-style adapter ensures a perfect OE fit for quick and easy installation on compatible vehicles
[PRECISION FIT & MAXIMUM VISIBILITY] - Custom beam curvature and dual precision-tensioned steel springs maintain even pressure across the windshield for crystal-clear visibility
[INNOVATIVE BEAM DESIGN] - AeroTwin’s patented bracketless wiper blade eliminates metal and plastic joints or hinges, providing a sleek, high-tech upgrade for vehicles with conventional wipers
[AERODYNAMIC WIND SPOILER] - Asymmetrical spoiler design enhances blade-to-windshield contact, improving performance at highway speeds while protecting against harsh weather elements
product_description: Bosch AeroTwin's patented beam design contains no metal or plastic brackets, joints or hinges, offering an ideal technology upgrade for vehicles originally fitted with conventional wiper blades. The specially blended dual rubber compound with graphite coating removes even the smallest traces of water for exceptional all-weather visibility and smooth, quiet operation. Specific beam curvature for OE specialty wiper arm types, coupled with dual precision-tensioned steel springs, ensures uniform pressure along the entire blade length for crystal clear visibility. Built-in asymmetrical wind spoiler uses air flow to increase blade-to-windshield contact - for consistent performance at highway speeds. Wind spoiler also serves to protect the tension springs from damage by severe weather elements for increased durability and long life. Pre-assembled OE style adapter provides OE fit and function for simple, easy installation on specific vehicles. Set of 2. Note: AeroTwin wiper blades are designed to fit vehicles with specific wiper arm connnection types - they are not universal fit wiper blades. Please verify specific vehicle fitment details with fit checker above.

name: TRICO Diamond 22" + 22" Super Premium Automotive Replacement Windshield Wiper Blades (Set of 2), Passenger and Driver Side All-Weather Beam Wiper Blades for Select Vehicle Models (Item #25-2222)
short_description: 22" + 22" DRIVER & PASSENGER SIDE SUPER PREMIUM BEAM BLADES: Our Diamond blades are constructed with the highest-quality materials to provide next-level performance under more demanding conditions—from heavy rain to hail, sleet, or snow

SUPER SMOOTH GLIDE: Made with high-quality highglide treated rubber that provides a sleek and shiny clean without the chatter and noise of traditional wipers so you can keep your windshield looking fresh and transparent without the drag

AERODYNAMIC PERFORMANCE: Innovative VorTec aerofoil is wind-resistant up to 135 mph to keep your blades intact for a safer view throughout use, and the blade's aerodynamic styling converts wind force into maximum windshield contact

QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION: Enjoy hassle free installation within minutes with our windshield wipers; Diamond wipers are compatible with various arm types so you do not have to worry about seeking another replacement - just connect, install, and wipe

VEHICLE APPLICATIONS:(Please check full vehicle applications under product description) 2001–2005 Acura EL; 2002–2003 Alfa Romeo 166; 1998–2002 Audi A3; 2000–2004 Audi S3; 2000–2008 Chevrolet Astra; 2011–2018 Chevrolet Tornado; 2007–2014 Fiat Strada; 2024–2024 Ford Mustang; 2001–2005 Honda Civic; 1997–2001 Honda Prelude; 1991–2002 INFINITI G20; 1990–1992 INFINITI M30; 2003–2004 INFINITI M45; 2019–2023 JAC Frison; 1994–2001 Kia Sephia; 2000–2004 Kia Spectra; 1992–1996 Lexus ES300; 1993–1997 Lexus GS300; 2004–2009 Mazda 3; 2009–2009 Mazda 3 Sport; 1999–2003 Mazda Protege; 2002–2003 Mazda Protege5; 1994–1998 Mitsubishi Galant; 1997–2002 Mitsubishi Mirage; 2009–2021 Nissan 370Z
product_description: Come rain or shine, ensure a clear view on the road with TRICO Diamond Premium Beam Blades. Built to power through even the most demanding of conditions and provide complete visibility, these ultra-premium windshield wiper blades are our most powerful blades, delivering a smoother glide, exceptional contact and pressure, and the highest-quality materials. Whether there's rain, hail, sleet, or snow, you can drive with confidence in all weather conditions. Made with high-quality highglide treated rubber, our passenger and driver windshield wiper blades provide a sleek and shiny clean without the chatter and noise of traditional wipers so you can keep your windshield looking fresh and transparent without the drag. The innovative VorTec aerofoil is wind-resistant up to 135 mph to keep your blades intact, while the aerodynamic styling converts wind force into maximum windshield contact. With more pressure comes a better wiper blade performance. That's why our better engineered beam blade design with a dual-point coupler allows for the wiper blade to properly fit today's modern, curved windshields, providing better performance when you need it most. Diamond wipers are compatible with various arm types, so you do not have to worry about seeking another replacement and can enjoy a hassle-free installation within minutes. Simply connect, install, and wipe. VEHICLE APPLICATIONS: 1991–2005 Acura NSX; 2011–2012 Airstream Avenue; 1965–1970 Aston Martin DB6; 1989–1994 Aston Martin Virage; 1993–1993 Asuna Sunfire; 1992–1994 Audi 100; 1992–1994 Audi 100 Quattro; 1995–2001 Audi A6; 1995–2001 Audi A6 Quattro; 1997–2000 Audi A8; 1997–2002 Audi A8 Quattro; 2001–2001 Audi Allroad Quattro; 1995–1998 Audi Cabriolet; 1992–1994 Audi S4; 1995–2001 Audi S6; 2001–2002 Audi S8; 1993–1994 Audi V8 Quattro; 1996–2010 Bentley Azure; 1992–2002 Bentley Continental; 2000–2000 Bering HD67MX; 1999–2000 Bering MD23M; 2000–2000 Bering MD26M; 2005–2009 Buick Allure; 1997–2005 Buick Century; 1991–1996 Buick Commercial Chassis; 2005–2009 Buick LaCrosse; 1992–2005 Buick LeSabre; 1991–2005 Buick Park Avenue; 2004–2007 Buick Rainier; 19
